title: JKPSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 65 Assistant Professor Posts
description: Jammu & Kashmir Public Service Commission (JKPSC)has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 65 Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD/ MS, DNB, M.Ch, M.Sc, and Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the JKPSC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online befo...
